posts.post_title: Lot of 3 Walter Johnson Cards for Sale. T206, T201, T207
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chris Buckler
For sale (3) Walter Johnson cards. All cards are Graded/Authenticated.

1912 T207 Walter Johnson Brown Recruit Back GAI 2

1909 T206 Walter Johnson Portrait PSA Authentic. Piedmont Back.

T201 Mecca Double Folder Walter Johnson PSA 1.

$900 shipped for the group. Paypal is ok. 

Contact me at bucklercards@yahoo.com
